verses.verse: At that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H4757>Merodach<s%>â€“baladan, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1081>Baladan<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> and a <S%H4503>present<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>: for he had <S%H8085>heard<s%> that he had been <S%H2470>sick<s%>, and was <S%H2388>recovered<s%>.

And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> was <S%H8055>glad<s%> of <S%H7200>them<s%>, and showed them the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his precious <S%H5238>things<s%>, the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and the <S%H1314>spices<s%>, and the <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H8081>ointment<s%>, and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H3627>armor<s%>, and all that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H214>treasures<s%>: there was <S%H1697>nothing<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, nor in all his <S%H4475>dominion<s%>, that <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> showed them <S%H7200>not<s%>.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> unto <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, What said these <S%H582>men<s%>? and from from <S%H370>where<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> they unto <S%H2396>you<s%>? And Hezekiah <S%H559>said<s%>, They are <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> unto <S%H894>me<s%>, even from Babylon.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7200>he<s%>, What have they seen in your <S%H1004>house<s%>? And <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%>, All that is in my <S%H1004>house<s%> have they <S%H7200>seen<s%>: there is <S%H1697>nothing<s%> among my <S%H214>treasures<s%> that I have not showed <S%H7200>them<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>:

<S%H3117>Behold<s%>, the days <S%H935>come<s%>, that all that is in your <S%H1004>house<s%>, and that which your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have laid up in <S%H686>store<s%> until this <S%H3117>day<s%>, shall be <S%H5375>carried<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>: <S%H1697>nothing<s%> shall be <S%H3498>left<s%>, <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> that shall <S%H3318>issue<s%> from <S%H3205>you<s%>, which you shall beget, shall they take <S%H3947>away<s%>; and they shall be <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> in the <S%H1964>palace<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> to <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%>, <S%H2896>Good<s%> is the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> which you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%>. He <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7965>moreover<s%>, For there shall be peace and <S%H571>truth<s%> in my <S%H3117>days<s%>.
